title: Technology-Enhanced Collaborative Academic Writing: Mathematics Practitioner Competency Strengthening Project

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational academic writing skills and expertise in the mathematics domain
context.additional_context: Current mathematics practitioners collaborate to author academic documents using digital tools in a project-based setting.

learning_goals: Learners can collaboratively draft mathematics research papers in teams of three using Google Docs and Zoom.
Learners can apply a feedback system on the Moodle platform to incorporate peer evaluations and structured revision recommendations from instructors.
Learners can execute collaborative writing strategies according to a three-stage (pre-writing-during writing-post-writing) process using digital tools.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
